attributes.action: Make illegal to sue the NHS and other public organisations.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of outstanding cases for the NHS is estimated at £83 BN.  The cost of the NHS is £129 BN a year.
attributes.background: Change the constitution to prevent this waste of public money. An amount that would pay for HS2

rejection.details: Petitions need to call for the UK Parliament and Government to take a specific action. We can't accept your petition because we're not sure what you mean by "other public organisations".
